name: Hearts foundation
mission: We are entrepreneurs, philanthropists, and Americans entrusted with success, skills, and responsibility. We aim to revive the spirit of being a mercy to all creation through scholarship, research, and the cultivation of hearts.
theoryOfChange: From knowledge to sound hearts to generational change.

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Limited match due to weaker results and/or higher uncertainty; review methodology details before deciding.

components.improvement_suggestion: Add a dedicated zakat page or program and highlight humanitarian dimensions of your work
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

components.improvement_suggestion: Clearly document your primary cause area on your website

components.improvement_suggestion: Track and report beneficiary counts to enable cost analysis
components.name: Cost Per Beneficiary

components.improvement_suggestion: Publish operating-reserve levels and adopt a board-approved reserve policy (typically 3-12 months for most nonprofits).

components.evidence: Board governance: baseline (unknown members, emerging org)

score_details.score_summary: Hearts Together Foundation shows limited alignment and limited impact.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization receives a score of 33/100, reflecting significant gaps in available financial data and a very low data confidence level of 0.05.
areas_for_improvement: Limited public financial data and third-party performance metrics
Low data confidence score due to lack of available documentation
Need for transparent impact reporting and cost-per-beneficiary data

dimension_explanations.alignment: The alignment score of 19/50 is medium-low, as the organization's specific donor fit is currently rated as low and the urgency of the cause remains unknown. While it offers a pathway for sadaqah-eligible giving, more information is needed to determine its long-term track record and resonance with broader donor priorities.
dimension_explanations.impact: The impact score of 14/50 is considered low because there is currently no available data regarding cost per beneficiary or third-party verification of program effectiveness. While the foundation engages in capacity building, the lack of measurable outcomes limits the assessment of its direct effectiveness.

baseline_narrative.headline: Hearts Together Foundation is a philanthropic organization dedicated to spiritual cultivation and capacity building through research and reflection.
strengths: Clear mission focus on scholarly research and spiritual cultivation
Diverse program portfolio including Capacity Building and Internal Change
Led by a dedicated group of entrepreneurs and philanthropists
baseline_narrative.summary: The Hearts Together Foundation operates as a collective of entrepreneurs and philanthropists focused on reviving a spirit of mercy through scholarly research and internal change. The organization facilitates programs designed to build capacity and foster spiritual growth within the community.
